a languag independ macro processor a macro processor is describwhich can be us with almost ani sourc languag itprovid all featur normal associ with a macro facil pluthe abil to make arbitrari transform of the argument stringthe program is us at the basser comput depart universof sydnei sydnei australia to process text for eight differcompil cacm juli 1967 wait w m ca670708 jb februari28 1978 8 35 am 1358 4 1565 1530 41565 1531 4 1565 1541 4 1565 1565 4 15651565 4 1565 1565 4 1565 1565 4 1565 17034 1565 1781 4 1565 1781 4 1565 1788 41565 1824 4 1565 1945 4 1565 2036 4 15652252 4 1565 1162 5 1565 205 5 1565 13585 1565 1455 5 1565 1530 5 1565 1565 51565 1565 5 1565 1565 5 1565 1781 5 15651852 5 1565 2034 5 1565 123 6 1565 1966 1565 919 6 1565 984 6 1565 990 61565 1007 6 1565 1046 6 1565 1131 6 15651139 6 1565 1140 6 1565 1149 6 1565 11986 1565 1215 6 1565 1223 6 1565 1231 61565 1265 6 1565 1303 6 1565 1323 6 15651358 6 1565 1366 6 1565 1421 6 1565 14556 1565 1460 6 1565 1462 6 1565 1463 61565 1467 6 1565 1468 6 1565 1477 6 15651491 6 1565 1496 6 1565 1531 6 1565 15356 1565 1565 6 1565 1565 6 1565 1565 61565 1565 6 1565 1601 6 1565 1602 6 15651613 6 1565 1614 6 1565 1626 6 1565 16416 1565 1787 6 1565 1788 6 1565 205 61565 224 6 1565 1852 6 1565 249 6 1565288 6 1565 1926 6 1565 1947 6 1565 3166 1565 381 6 1565 398 6 1565 11 61565 404 6 1565 410 6 1565 463 6 1565464 6 1565 483 6 1565 3184 6 1565 31886 1565 584 6 1565 600 6 1565 680 61565 691 6 1565 763 6 1565 799 6 1565
